Chowlk framework© María Poveda Villalón  & Serge Chávez-Feria
Future Work
43
§
The implementation of a plugin in diagrams.net to accelerate even more the construction
of the ontology.
o Also to detect and correct syntax errors rapidly.
§
To explore the usage of the tool with other visualizations by adapting the detection 
module.
§
To explore the reverse process, from an ontology to a diagram in diagrams.net.
§
To integrate it into OnToology?
§
Systematic comparisson of the visual notation with other existing ones + user-based 
evaluation. 
§
Submit Chowlk converter (+ lightweight description of notation) to ESWC resources
